channel.title: Need help, so players can join my server
channel.description:
Hello, i am using TinyScape credits to tinyscape.
Ive need to know, how players can join my server. Ive looked around in the forum. Nothing found that ill need.
Where ill can see what ip i need give to my friends, so they join? Ive tried with my own IP. But that didnt work :p So what i want, is that players can join my servers
Regards Aers20
PS:i got a host in No-Ip. I did make one and downloaded No-IP DUC. And put it postive. I need do more steps?
Please answer
PS2: I hope you got to understand me enough, my english is not so good like others.

item.title: Need help, so players can join my server
item.dc:creator: @aers20 aers20
item.description:
@aers20 wrote:

Thank you Tension Ltd!

He fixed it.

All what i must do was port forwarding ;D

Thank you very much bro! ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, so players can join my server

item.title: Need help, so players can join my server
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

go to portforward.com and look up ur router/modem and they will give u a good guide how to do it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, so players can join my server

item.title: Need help, so players can join my server
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Have you tried Portfowarding?

and with no-ip, your friends use that ip to log in

If you need help send me pm with your teamviewer stufff

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, so players can join my server
